text:
N26 (www.n26.com) | Berlin, Germany | CTO | Full-time, onsite

N26 is the most advanced bank account in Europe and the first that you can fully manage on your smartphone. We are looking for an experienced CTO with a stellar, proven track record in building and leading agile tech teams.

For more details, check out the link: http://grnh.se/f2ircl1
